summary: A documentary focusing on the tumultuous early days of this iconic vaudeville superstar who ruled the 1920's Flapper Era in the U.S. Before Mae West, Marilyn Monroe, Bette Midler, Madonna ... See full summary Â»
cast: Barbara Walters|Tony Bennett|Carol Channing|Michael Feinstein|Shecky Greene|Bruce Vilanch|Paul Anka|Kaye Ballard|Chubby Checker|Don Dellair|Joe Franklin|Jane Kean|Gerry Leader|Brenda Lee|Tony Martin|Mickey Rooney|Libi Staiger|Connie Stevens|Kaye Stevens|Sophie Tucker|Mamie Van Doren|Rusty Warren
title: The Outrageous Sophie Tucker
